result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John R Gates

defendant.name: Gates, John R
defendant.address: 1001 N. Chicago Avenue, Upper, South Milwaukee, WI 53172

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant John R Gates in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Student Intern Daniel Murphy under the supervision of Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case 15CF1931 for the purposes of sentencing.

Defendant John R Gates in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Branch 22 agrees to take case as part of a global resolution.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant John R Gates in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Pending felony.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch
 47. Court preapproved transfer to felony court for global resolution if accepted.  Status conference scheduled for 08-06-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Mark Allan Dluzak in court, defendant John R Gates not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 07-30-2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant John R Gates in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant John R Gates in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
